lyric:
[00:13.84]Have you ever seen a rainbow go
[00:21.02]Have you ever seen a light bulb blow
[00:28.27]Do you wanna see a heart get broken
[00:35.22]I didn't think so
[00:38.78]I didn't think so
[00:42.95]Don't say goodbye
[00:46.06]When you don't have to go
[00:49.93]I'd rather hear lies
[00:53.22]Than what I need to know
[00:57.63]See you later would suit me fine
[01:01.34]You can use that one anytime
[01:03.46]Tell me anything that you like
[01:09.61]But don't say goodbye
[01:25.42]Have you ever seen an ember go out
[01:32.69]Have you ever seen a fire drown
[01:39.77]Have you ever seen a dream get grounded
[01:46.88]Do you want to
[01:50.31]Unless you want to
[01:54.67]Don't say goodbye
[01:57.51]When you don't have to go
[02:01.63]I'd rather hear lies
[02:04.85]Than what I need to know
[02:09.25]See you later would suit me fine
[02:12.96]You can use that one anytime
[02:15.06]Tell me anything that you like
[02:21.28]But don't say goodbye
[02:26.47]Please just say something nice to me
[02:35.85]You can decide what it'll be
[02:43.36]Just do one thing for me please
[02:51.99]Don't say goodbye
[02:54.96]When you don't have to go
[02:58.92]I'd rather hear lies
[03:02.16]Than what I need to know
[03:06.54]See you later would suit me fine
[03:10.25]You can use that one anytime
[03:12.63]Tell me anything that you like
[03:18.55]But don't say goodbye
tlyric:
[by:-PumpkinG]
[00:13.84]你可见过彩虹消散
[00:21.02]你可见过灯火尽灭
[00:28.27]你是否想看一场心碎
[00:35.22]我不这么想
[00:38.78]我不这么想
[00:42.95]不说再见
[00:46.06]在你不是非离开不可的时候
[00:49.93]我宁可听信谎言
[00:53.22]也不想知道事实
[00:57.63]回头见会更合适
[01:01.34]你可以随时使用这句话
[01:03.46]告诉我你所有喜好
[01:09.61]但不要说再见
[01:25.42]你见过柴火焚尽吗
[01:32.69]你见过大火熊燃吗
[01:39.77]你见过梦想被搁浅吗
[01:46.88]你想要吗
[01:50.31]除非你想要
[01:54.67]不要说再见
[01:57.51]当你不是非走不可的时候
[02:01.63]我宁可听信谎言
[02:04.85]也不想知道事实
[02:09.25]回头见会更合适
[02:12.96]你可以随时使用这句话
[02:15.06]告诉我你所有喜好
[02:21.28]但不要说再见
[02:26.47]请只对我讲述美好的事
[02:35.85]你可以主宰一切
[02:43.36]请只对我做一件事
[02:51.99]不要说再见
[02:54.96]不要说再见当你不是非走不可的时候
[02:58.92]我宁可听信谎言
[03:02.16]也不想知道事实
[03:06.54]回头见会更合适
[03:10.25]你可以随时使用这句话
[03:12.63]告诉我你所有喜好
[03:18.55]但不要说再见
